About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Jay is a Software Tester by day and Podcster at night. He is experiened with full system development lifecycle including designing, developing and implementing test plans, test cases and test processes fueling swift corrective actions. He has strong creative and analytical skills. Team player with an eye for detail.

Senior Software Tester

Manual Tester

From May 2021 - Present

Experienced in creating test plan, executing test cases and upload the defect/bugs in bug tracking system like Mantis. Also, I'm well experienced in troubleshooting bugs which are at configuration level. Worked on GovEVA system which is "Next-Gen Board Management Software for Realtime Collaboration".

Podcast Host

The Four Minutes Show

March 2021 - Present

I talk with guest about the early stage in their career and how did they overcome difficult times in life. I believe we all learn from mistakes so why not listen to someone who already went through it and learn from them. Also, the guest gives the best piece of advice at the end which you will like to listen to.

Project Lead

Core Team Member

From June 2019 - December 2019

I've done internship at India's biggest tech community for 6 month as project lead and a core team team member of GirlScript India Summit and LetsPy Nagpur 2019. I have also won 21 under 21 award for outstanding work.
